text: Judo at the 2019 Pacific Games was held on 16–17 July 2019 in Apia, Samoa. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Men's events === {| |- |rowspan=2| −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −66 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −73 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −81 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −90 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −100 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| +100 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Lightweight Open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Heavyweight Open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- | Team | | | |} ===Women's events === {| |- |rowspan=2| −57 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| −63 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- | −70 kg | | | not awarded |- | −78 kg | | | |- | +78 kg | | | |- |rowspan=2| Lightweight Open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Heavyweight Open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- | Team | | | |} ==See also== * Judo at the Pacific Games ==References== 2019 Category:2019 Pacific Games Pacific Games
